tool_description: Get extractive summaries for you textual data
name: TLDR Summary
title: TLDR Summary

api_list.name: Extractive Summary
api_list.description: Get a list of phrases extracted from the original text which best describe the keypoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tldr-summary.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/summary/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tldr-summary.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tldr-summary.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/summary/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tldr-summary.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
